JobFullDesc: F2 (Facebook Financial) is a product group at Facebook focused on building products to make payments and financial services simpler, for everyone and secure across our apps. We want to empower people everywhere to send money to each other, give them the confidence to buy and sell things online, and help businesses grow.Facebook is seeking a highly quantitative, driven, and creative leader to oversee Business Operations and FP&A for F2, supporting our payments and financial services offerings across Facebook’s family of apps.The role is in the Finance & Business Planning (FBP) organization. FBP’s mission is to enable Facebook to plan, prioritize, and execute as effectively as possible.This leader will serve as a financial adviser to F2 leadership, including the Head of F2, and will share in owning business goals and results where appropriate.
